snippet: With each side claiming popular support, President Obama and Congress’s Republican leaders dug in on their positions.
abstract: Pres Obama and Congress's Republican leaders hold strong to their conflicting positions about raising the nation's debt limit, indicating that president's second term will open with a potentially perilous budget showdown.

byline.original: By JACKIE CALMES and JONATHAN WEISMAN

lead_paragraph: With each side claiming popular support, President Obama and Congress’s Republican leaders dug in on their positions.

headline.seo: Obama and G.O.P. Set Debt Limit Showdown
headline.main: Obama and G.O.P. Issue Challenges on the Debt Limit
headline.print_headline: Obama and G.O.P. Issue Challenges for Their Conflicting Views on the Debt Limit
